# cells-step-concept

Component containing inputs for an operation concept and reference

Example:
```html
<cells-step-concept></cells-step-concept>
```

```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property | Description     | Default        |
|:----------------|:----------------|:--------------:|
| --cells-step-concept-scope      | scope description | default value  |
| --cells-step-concept  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-concept-full  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-concept-filled-p  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-concept-secondary-input  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-concept-btn-primary  | empty mixin     | {}             |
